backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with types and in‑memory maps for users, leads, outreach, deals, services, projects, and client service requests plus access‑control helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature implementations, related files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, Internet Identity auth gating, profile setup flow, and all main application routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyS: UI wrapper that restricts content to admins and shows an access‑denied alert for non‑admins.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClientServ: Admin panel that lists client service requests for the caller's agency with service lookup and table display.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to enter profile data, with admin allowlist prefill and registration submission.
frontend/src/components/common/ChartBloc: Wrapper component displaying a titled card layout for chart content and optional actions.
Card UI for showing lead details including status, contact info, and revenue potential.
frontend/src/components/common/ProgressB: Progress bar component showing percentage or value/max with optional label.
frontend/src/components/common/StatsCard: Stats display card with title, value, optional icon, subtitle, and trend indicator.
Main layout with mobile header, sidebar navigation, and content container.
frontend/src/components/nav/FollowUpBadg: Follow‑up notification badge showing leads due today, currently using placeholder logic.
frontend/src/components/nav/SidebarNav.t: Sidebar navigation with route links, admin‑aware items, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching authenticated or anonymous backend actors and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgencyAnalytics.ts: Hook fetching agency analytics data sets once actor and user profile are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRole.ts: Hooks fetching the caller's user role and admin status from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientServiceReque: Hooks for creating and fetching client service requests by agency or globally.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for retrieving, saving, and registering the current user's profile with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeals.ts: Hooks to fetch user deals and update deal status using react-query and actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity auth, exposing identity loading, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Hooks for querying and mutating lead data, including add, update status, and bulk import.
frontend/src/hooks/useOutreach.ts: Hooks to fetch outreach activities and add new outreach entries with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Hooks to fetch all services and mutate services by adding or updating their active status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Analytics dashboard showing revenue charts and summary metrics from agency analytics data.
Client onboarding UI allowing users to select services and submit service requests tied to their identity.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays agency analytics with stats, charts, revenue progress, and outreach breakdown, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPage.tsx: Shows deals grouped by status with counts and total values, including loading and per-deal cards.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Lists leads with search and filters for niche and status, plus actions for importing and adding leads.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Displays outreach activities by platform using tabs, showing per-activity details and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PlannerPage.tsx: Provides a simple landing screen for starting a 30‑day outreach planner.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder project list with an option to add new projects.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalSharePage.tsx: Renders a basic proposal viewer placeholder using a proposalId from route params.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists services with pricing and stats, supports toggling active state and adding new services.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders the user settings page showing profile fields, API key placeholder, and admin-only subscription and service-request panels.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Provides a sign-in form that stores an identifier and initiates Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Defines admin allowlist data and functions to detect and prefill admin identifiers.
frontend/src/utils/signInIdentifier.ts: Manages storing, classifying, and comparing sign‑in identifiers in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s high‑level build state, architecture notes, features, and known issues for Quick Bee.
